stimulusHtml: A certain middle school opens at 7 A.M., and classes begin at 8 A.M. A sociologist gathered data on the number of minutes after 7 A.M. that a student arrives at school and the number of friends the student has on social media. The correlation between the two variables indicated a strong negative relationship. Which of the following is an appropriate interpretation of the correlation?
choicesHtml: Students who arrive early to school have more friends on social media.
Students who arrive late to school have more friends on social media.
Having a lot of friends on social media causes a student to arrive late for school.
As the number of minutes of arriving after 7 A.M. increases, the number of friends on social media tends to increase.
As the number of minutes of arriving after 7 A.M. increases, the number of friends on social media tends to decrease.
